resources.string:
Hi my name is Lev. 

I Love volleyball. 

I play different kind of volleyball. 

For Example: snowvowlley, beachvolley and classic volleyball. 

Also I go to the gym 

I like to travel too. I have already been in Turkey, Finland, Sweden, Czech Republic, Israel, India, Belarus, Ukraine, Hungary, Latvia, Cyprus, Vietnam, Tunis, Georgia, etc. And I'm going to visit more countries as much as possible. 

 I am working as Software developer for more than 5 years. At this moment I work in Raiffeisen Bank Russia. Previously I worked in Deutsche bank
